For decades, the curated audio compilation—the mixtape—has served as the primary vessel for adolescent angst, romantic declarations, and road trip anthems. Yet these vital cultural artifacts are under constant existential threat. At GOHMARS, we utilize proprietary somatic de-gravitation techniques to ensure their preservation against magnetic decay, cosmic ray interference, and gravitational collapse.
